head.supplied: QUARTERLY ESTIMATE. ¶ To the Honorable ¶ ¶ the Chief Secretary ¶ Sir ¶ , ¶ ¶ I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate ¶ * ¶ of Expenditure during the ¶ two months ¶ two monthso...

div.p: N78/7635, unit 1019, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

note.p: MS written by G. Luehmann and signed by M.

div.p: To the Honorable the Chief Secretary

I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate *
of Expenditure during the two months
two months over Quarter struck through.
ending 31st August 1 878.

cell.p:
Estimate *
of Expenditure for two months
two months over Quarter struck through.
